import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { useSelector, useDispatch } from 'react-redux'; import { Button, Modal, Container, Row, Col, Form, Table } from 'react-bootstrap'; function Settings() { const [modalShow, setModalShow] = useState(false); const dispatch = useDispatch(); const { daily_time, daily_break, weekly_break, free_days } = useSelector( state => state.settings ); return (<> setModalShow(false) } size="lg"> Panel CarrotHR Maksymalny dzienny czas pracy: dispatch({ type: 'DAILY_TIME', value: e.target.value })}/> Minimalna przerwa między zmianami: dispatch({ type: 'DAILY_BREAK', value: e.target.value })}/> Minimalna tygodniowa przerwa: dispatch({ type: 'WEEKLY_BREAK', value: e.target.value }) }/>
Dni wolne: { ["mon", "tue", "wed", "thu", "fri", "sat", "sun"].map(key => { return ( dispatch({ type: 'FREE_DAYS', key: key, value: e.target.checked }) } checked={ ( free_days[key] !== null ) ? true : false } custom /> ) }) } { Object.entries(free_days).map(([key, value]) => { if ( value !== null ) { return ( { key } dispatch({ type: 'FREE_DAYS_INDEX', key: key, value: e.target.value }) }/> dispatch({ type: 'FREE_DAYS_PERMANENT', key: key, value: e.target.checked }) } checked={ value.permanent} custom /> ) } })}
Minimalna załoga pracownicza:
Zmiana: I II III
Poniedziałek dispatch({ type: 'FREE_DAYS_INDEX', key: key, value: e.target.value }) }/> 5 0
Wtorek 4 4 0
) } export default Settings;
